docs.snippet: Paranoia about Russian meddling only makes Moscow stronger....
docs.lead_paragraph: Paranoia about Russian meddling only makes Moscow stronger.

docs.snippet: Signs of Republican decline, even in the Deep South....
docs.lead_paragraph: Signs of Republican decline, even in the Deep South.
docs.abstract: Charles M Blow Op-Ed column underscores how little support Donald Trump has in black communities, citing NBC/Wall Street Journal poll that shows only 1 percent of registered black voters favor him; explores degree to which black vote could tip Republican-leaning Southern states over to Democrats.

headline.main: Trump’s Troubles in the Black Belt
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Troubles in the Black Belt

docs.snippet: A third election in Spain would do nothing to resolve a deadlock that has left the country without a new government for over seven months, an influential survey suggested on Monday, piling pressure on leaders to find another way out of the impasse...
docs.lead_paragraph: A third election in Spain would do nothing to resolve a deadlock that has left the country without a new government for over seven months, an influential survey suggested on Monday, piling pressure on leaders to find another way out of the impasse.

headline.main: Third Spanish Election Would Extend Political Gridlock, Poll Suggests
headline.print_headline: Third Spanish Election Would Extend Political Gridlock, Poll Suggests

docs.snippet: Black, middle-class voters appeared more concerned with mundane matters like good governance and taxes than with the party’s heroic liberation past....
docs.lead_paragraph: Black, middle-class voters appeared more concerned with mundane matters like good governance and taxes than with the party’s heroic liberation past.
docs.abstract: South Africa's once-dominant African National Congress, post-apartheid political party founded by Nelson Mandela, sustained heavy losses in recent municipal elections; middle-class voters weary of ANC scandals and complacency are increasingly turning to other parties as viable alternatives.

headline.main: Election Shows Many South Africans Losing Faith in ‘Pompous’ A.N.C.
headline.print_headline: South Africa Ponders Fidelity to Party of Mandela

docs.snippet: The overwhelming case for deficit spending....
docs.lead_paragraph: The overwhelming case for deficit spending.
docs.abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column makes case for massive investment in national infrastructure, to be paid for with increased government borrowing; warns only way this needed investment would be possible is if Clinton wins presidency and Democrats make significant gains in Congress.

docs.snippet: In the face of a growing epidemic, Mr. Pence put aside his own moral opposition to giving syringes to drug users to allow a needle exchange program....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the face of a growing epidemic, Mr. Pence put aside his own moral opposition to giving syringes to drug users to allow a needle exchange program.
docs.abstract: Indiana officials recount how conservative Republican Gov Mike Pence overcame personal opposition to needle exchanges and ultimately suspended state law regulating hypodermic syringes to address overwhelming surge of HIV cases in Scott County in 2015; program, along with drug therapy and aggressive outreach, slowed the flood of new HIV cases to trickle during Indiana's worst health crisis in decades.

headline.main: Mike Pence’s Response to H.I.V. Outbreak: Prayer, Then a Change of Heart
headline.print_headline: Pence on H.I.V. Crisis: Prayer and Pragmatism

docs.snippet: In Thailand's rural heartland, supporters of former prime minister Thaksin Shinawatra say they will focus on winning an election next year, even though they would have to govern on military terms if they win....
docs.lead_paragraph: In Thailand's rural heartland, supporters of former prime minister Thaksin Shinawatra say they will focus on winning an election next year, even though they would have to govern on military terms if they win.

headline.main: In Thailand, Bruised Opposition Seeks Solace in 2017 Vote Prospects
headline.print_headline: In Thailand, Bruised Opposition Seeks Solace in 2017 Vote Prospects

docs.snippet: Leaders of Zimbabwean war veterans on Monday boycotted a speech by President Robert Mugabe to honor fighters of the country's independence war, widening a rift with Africa's oldest leader, whom the veterans have asked to step down....
docs.lead_paragraph: Leaders of Zimbabwean war veterans on Monday boycotted a speech by President Robert Mugabe to honor fighters of the country's independence war, widening a rift with Africa's oldest leader, whom the veterans have asked to step down.
